name: get_specific_insult
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool the_dozen_the_yo_mamsa_roast_api.
Tool description: Rest API that serves random, catagorized and filteres lighthearted familial insults/jokes
API description: Fetches a specific insult using the provided insult ID and RapidAPI key.

is_id.description: The UUID for the specific insult to be retrieved.
